briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Circadin® 2 mg in the Treatment of Primary Insomnia Patients
officialTitle: A Double-blind, Parallel Group, Randomised, Placebo Controlled Study of Efficacy and Safety of Circadin® 2 mg in the Treatment of Insomnia Patients With Low Endogenous Melatonin
summary: This is a randomised, placebo controlled study to evaluate the efficacy of a 3 week treatment period with Circadin® 2 mg in shortening sleep latency in patients with primary insomnia aged 18-80 with melatonin deficiency.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Change From Baseline in Subjective Sleep Latency.
